meanings.definition: The act or process of hyperinvolution.
meanings.sent1: The hyperinvolution of the flower petals made them wilt quickly.
meanings.sent2: Doctors observed hyperinvolution in the patient's healing process.
meanings.sent3: The hyperinvolution of the cake caused it to shrink in size unexpectedly.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperinvolution of the puzzle led to solving it in record time.
meanings.sent5: The hyperinvolution of the snowman's body made it melt rapidly under the sun.

meanings.sent1: The hyperinvolution of the skin cells resulted in a rare condition.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with hyperinvolution of the organ.
meanings.sent3: The hyperinvolution of the traffic flow made the commute surprisingly smooth.
meanings.sent4: Her hyperinvolution of the story's plot made it unpredictable and exciting.
meanings.sent5: The hyperinvolution of the plant's growth caused it to wither prematurely.
